transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, a very good evening sir.
Customer: Ha bolo.
Executive: Ji sir meri baat Sita Industries mein ho rahi hai?
Customer: Haan ji madam.
Executive: Ji sir main main Juhi baat kar rahi hu Akash ki manager. Aapki baat hui hogi.
Customer: Haan hui thi na.
Executive: Yes sir. Sir aap abhi jo hai aapse discussion hua hoga uska, right?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ji so sir kya discussion hua tha? Because aapne jo hai not satisfied mark kiya hai. Matlab kya concern hai aapka?
Customer: Mera wahi hai madam notification kyun milta nahi hai madam. Main desktop pe khula hua rehta hu. Itna TrustSeal package kiya. Unhone lighting ka jo category maine select kiya hua hai flameproof ka. Main turant utarne jaata hu toh notification bhi nahi aata madam.
Lead ka.
Executive: Okay matlab buyleads ka notification nahi aata aapko?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Okay. Aap aage se bol do na madam aapko. Bar bar madam mujhe puchoge isse main mera baat pura usse usi se maine kiya hua hai madam.
Executive: Okay. Sir actually jo notification na jaane ka bhi ek reason hai. Because aapki jo product line hai sir, us product line mein sir aath jo hai aath se 10,000 sir buyleads jo hai post hoti hai daily basis pe IndiaMART pe, right? So sir wo hum bar bar aapko jo hai notification bhejenge na, ek toh uski aap pe jo hai aap irritated honge because bar bar because har ek second pe ye jo hai bajega, right?
Customer: Madam mera ek category hai na pehle pehle kuch tha main main bada irritated hota hu. Mujhe allow kar do mujhe lighting ka notification aayega mujhe bajna chahiye madam.
Turant lead generate hua turant.
Executive: Sir wo wo main aapke concern ko samajh rahi hu. But sir actually jo notification hai na wo pehle bheji jaati thi ab nahi bheji jaati because jo clients the na unhone kafi complain kari thi. Kyunki unki phone ki battery down hoti hai aur bar bar wo irritated hote hai. Kyunki sir har second mein ek buylead post hoti hai.
Hain na? To sir aisa aapke paas aapke paas aapke liye possible nahi hoga ki aap har ek jo hai buylead ko dekhe.
Sir iske liye aapko jo hai online active rehna hoga. Notification ka sir feature jo hai abhi nahi hai because clients ne complain kari thi toh wo band ho gaya hai.
Customer: Ji sir. Madam main ye bol raha hu ki mera lead generate hota hai na mere category ka toh wo notification aata hi hai madam. Kisi kisi mein aata hai kisi mein nahi aata toh kyun nahi aata madam aap mujhe ulta mat samjhao madam. Main aapko samjhata hu jab jab mera lead generate hota hai, EPB panel JB ka wagera ka mera jo category hai toh main usme kam deal karta hu toh uska notification mujhe turant tin tin karke ring bajta hai.
Executive: Sir actually.
Customer: Jo mera flameproof lighting category hai suno na mere meri baat sun lo pehle. Mera lighting category hai usme notification kyun nahi bajta madam? Aake chala jaata mujhe pata bhi nahi chalta madam. Mere sath kabhi hota hai madam. Notification aane chahiye na madam. Maine lakh rupaye ka package dala toh kaunsa dala?
Executive: Ji sir bilkul main aapke concern ko samajhti hu. Ek bar main check kar leti hu aapke. Madam maine IndiaMART ke liye main special naya mobile laya hu battery ka bhi issue mat mujhe samjhao jo bhi hai kuch mujhe nahi sunna mujhe notification aana chahiye bas.
Aap chahe jo bhi karo madam. Mujhe aur kuch aapka reason nahi sunna mujhe. Theek hai?
Executive: Ji sir bilkul. Sir iske alawa aur koi concern aapko aur koi dikkat notification ke alawa?
Customer: Bas iske alawa toh abhi wahi wahi dikkat hai madam. Mera jo main IndiaMART pe khol ke baitha rehta hu. Madam main khol ke baitha hua. Mera jo product hai flameproof lighting.
Executive: Ji sir.
Customer: Theek hai? Category bhi flameproof light karke rakha hua hai har ek mein.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Ji suno bilkul aapka concern samajh rahi hu jo notification ka hum apne end se pura try karenge resolve karne ka. Ji sir aapke paas mein abhi ek mail aayega. Sir iske alawa sir aapko aur koi dikkat nahi hai sirf notification ka dikkat hai. Sir buyleads wagera kaise aa rahi hai waise?
Customer: Abhi toh madam main IndiaMART pe jo package TrustSeal liya usse pehle sahi chal raha tha. TrustSeal liya uske baad ek rupaye ka kaam nahi bana madam.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Kuch kaam nahi hua madam uske baad. Khali phone call ek do badh gaya matlab wo bhi inquiry ke liye tha uska toh koi baat nahi wo toh koi bhi bhej sakta hai inquiry ke liye call kar sakta hai wo acha hai.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Ji. Toh sir aap na unko quotation wagera share kijiye aur follow up lete rahiye. Toh sir aisa nahi hai ki deal convert nahi hogi.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Uske liye toh main special ek aadmi bithaya madam follow up lene ke liye aadmi bithaya hai.
Theek hai?
Bas mujhe abhi jo mera category hai flameproof lighting, flameproof flood light uska mujhe notification aana chahiye bas baki kuch nahi chahiye madam.
Executive: Ji sir bilkul. Ji sir bilkul main apne end se isse main bilkul ek bar check kar lungi. Ji notification kyun nahi aa raha hai. Aur sir abhi aapko na mail pe mere liye jo hai feedback ka aayega. Toh please sir aap jo hai satisfied mark kar dijiyega. Ji please usse aap jo hai dekh lijiyega ek bar mail check karke. Ji aur main apne end se dekh lungi sir.
Customer: Madam aapko isme dekhte wo madam bhi Shriman madam bhi chale gaye kehte saal ke itne lead dungi itne lead dungi phir abhi 39 lead aaya bolta aapne use kiya wo chalo maine bhi mana ki use kiya hai. Phir bolti thi wo wo bhi bolti thi main personally aapko matlab lighting ke liye aapke liye 15 din ke liye ek din mera TrustSeal hua dusre din toh wo badal gaye dusre ko kaise handover de diya. 15 din mein aapko lead mein personally bhejungi aise aise toh baat hui thi madam. Abhi har ek baat mein aapko thodi samjhane jaunga uske trust pe toh maine TrustSeal karwaya tha baki toh mera wahi chal raha tha na madam.
Executive: Ji sir bilkul main aapke concern ko samajh rahi hu sir aapka jo hai bilkul ek bar main check kar leti hu ji notification kyun nahi aa raha hai. Ji aur sir aapka jo bhi concern raise hua hai wo main close kar deti hu. Aapke paas jo feedback aayega sirf wo mere feed jo hamara conversation hua hai uske liye jayega. Ji.
Customer: Nahi madam mera solution hoga phir uske baad mera solution hoga na madam kal se phir kal pura din main wait karunga uske baad mera koi kaam nahi hua toh main yahi pe dunga madam.
Aapko main abhi clear cut bol de raha hu baki abhi main kuch nahi dunga main. Baki main upar abhi mail bhi dalne wala hu par abhi nahi dalunga madam aap mein jo mere liye kaam kar rahe ho.
Executive: Ji. Sir actually wo jo feedback rahega wo hamare conversation ke liye rahega. Wo services ke regarding nahi rahega.
Customer: Wo conversation wo mere dimag mein baat nahi pad rahi madam. Aap samajh rahe ho ki nahi aap pehle solution do phir aap bologe aisa karunga main. Theek hai?
Executive: Okay sir koi issue nahi.
Customer: Wo madam bhi chale gaye aap bhi chale jaoge Akash bhai ko laga diya mere piche.
Shriman madam thodi achi si baat karti thi aisa nahi hai ki apna kaam solution diya usne. Phir upar TrustSeal karwaya uske baad ek do setting kuch na jaane karwaya uske baad dusre din pe resign rakh diya phir uske baad kisi aur ko mere kaise handover kar diya bolti hai ki main aapki baat maine main mere senior se baat kar di aisa kar diya aisa kar diya maine bola theek hai jaane do abhi 50 lead ke liye koi magajmari nahi karna bahut sara kama lunga isi mein.
Executive: Ji sir bilkul main aapki problem ko samajh rahi hu sir main main dekhti hu ek bar. Ji.
Customer: Wo sir bol rahe the tumhara activity acha hai aisa hai aisa hai main bola sir wo jo bhi hai par kaam ka activity nahi aata toh mujhe mujhe nahi aata.
Hello.
Hello.
Executive: Ji sir.
Customer: Haan. Ji sir main aapko theek hai aap aap apna ye solution lo.
Executive: Ji sir bilkul. Phir uske baad aap aage baat karte hai. Sir ye jo main concern hai na wo close kar du kyunki aaj hi concern close karna zaruri hai. Main yaha se close kar deti hu. Ji. Kyunki abhi baat toh ho gayi hai hamari.
Customer: Baat ho gayi par solution nahi hua isliye aap close mat karo madam. Theek hai?
Executive: Close. Okay. Haan uska solution dene ke baad aap close karo.
Executive: Ji sir mat kijiye sir dekhiye uska tension mat lijiye wo ho jayega notification ki dikkat hai wo ho jayegi.
Ji. Theek hai sir.
Customer: Nahi madam wo dekho TrustSeal se pehle pehle kabhi Shriman madam se aap baat kar lo aap sath mein ho toh unko puch lo ki ye client ka yahi problem tha wo TrustSeal hone ke baad bhi yahi problem solve nahi hua madam. Theek hai paisa dalne ke baad bhi solve nahi hua.
Aap samajh lo abhi abhi main abhi aapko prem se baat kar raha hu madam wo bhi solution abhi tak nahi hua madam. Theek hai isliye aap close mat karo abhi aap uska solution pehle do baad mein aap jo bhi chahe wo kar sakte ho madam.
Executive: Ji okay sir.
Customer: Haan main call rakh raha hu thank you.
Executive: Ji okay thank you sir.
Customer: Haan.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving buylead notifications.

- No business generated after TrustSeal package.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to check notification issue.

- Executive will send a feedback mail.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to resolve notification issue.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, notification, trustseal, subscription
